content.rendered: Baby Ava Daily Activities is a game about learning activities of our day to day life. This game is a collection of many activities with fun tasks, which are necessary in our regular life. In this Daily Routine Activities game, there is cute and little baby Ava who requires your help to complete her daily routine activities. There are so many routine activities which are not easy for Baby Ava like proper washing of hands and face, brushing teeth, taking a bath, cutting nails, doing hair, dressing up, eating healthy food, maintaining cleanliness, maintaining sleep time and many more.
